author: rwesten
msg: merged updates to STANBOL-1397 from trunk to 0.12.1 branch

author: rwesten
msg: STANBOL-1397: Added several configuration options to the NIF 2.0 engine. Also improved RDF serialization for single token phrases. Added support for nif:before and nif:after

author: gsim
msg: Fix to the way in which transactional state is sent on transfers and dispositions
